vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.17;
son of: Jehoiachin (H3078);
brother of: Zedekiah (H6667I)(?); father(?) of Malchiram (H4443), Pedaiah (H6305H), Shenazzar (H8137), Jekamiah (H3359H), Hoshama (H1953) and Nedabiah (H5072)
Aramaic of she.al.ti.el (שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל "Shealtiel" H7597A)
§ Shealtiel = "I have asked of God"
father of Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joaquim; padre de Zorobabel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒拉鐵 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我已求問過神"
所羅巴伯的父親 (拉 5:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒拉铁 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我已求问过神"
所罗巴伯的父亲 (拉 5:2)
